review_data.title: Café at the Park
review_data.content: The Restaurant B is part of the large, multi-story, green building complex at the Backeranlage. They open mornings for snacks, sweets, breads, hot & cold beverages, beer, and cocktails. During the winter their closing hours are early evening, but during the summer the hours extend...More
